channel.title: Homes on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on My New Hugo Site

item.description: Proposal Standard Libraries for Google AppsScripts Observations Regarding the concept of citizen developers (based on the community forums) They struggle with “simple” patterns, such as iterating over data structures. They struggle with commonly used design problems, such as how to use a cache There’s some more advanced coders who would like to make it easier for these citizen developers to use their code Identifiers The platform’s runtime already provides developers with identifiers with very cool code completion.
